func.title: Floor Heating Controls and Automated Meter Reading

case.title: CMD 0x1 - Set heating controls output
case.description:
This message is sent to a floor heating actuator. It controls the valve position of one channel or of all channels of the floor heating controls.
Sender: controller; send type: broadcast or addressed; expected response: CMD 0x3

datafield.data: Valve control period / PWM signal interval
datafield.description:
Total on-off time for two-position valve controller
(T valve open + T valve closed)
Command identifier
Type of connected valve
The heating channel that should be set
Measure and store the valve zero point
Valve set point 0…100% (0=closed, 100=open)

case.title: CMD 0x2 - Heating controls status query
case.description:
This message is sent to a floor heating actuator. It requests the status of one channel or the status of the global control unit of an actuator.
Sender: controller; send type: broadcast or addressed; expected response: CMD 0x3

datafield.description: Command identifier
The heating channel that should be reported

item.description: All valid channels and global device status

case.title: CMD 0x3 - Heating controls status response / CH = 0...15
case.description:
This message is sent by a floor heating controls if one of the following events occurs:
- Message 'status query' has been received (CMD 0x2).
- Status of one channel or temperature has changed.
Sender: actuator; send type: broadcast; maximum send delay 1 s.
If the response is for single channel data (CH = 0…15):

datafield.description: Command identifier
Status / Error indication of given channel
The heating channel that is reported
Actual valve position 0…100% (0=closed, 100=open)
The current return temperature of the channel

case.title: CMD 0x3 - Heating controls status response / CH = 31
case.description: If the response is for global floor heating controls unit data (CH = 31):

datafield.description: Command identifier
Global unit status
The heating channel that is reported (=global unit)
The current supply temperature of the unit
The current common return temperature

case.title: CMD 0x6 - Set meter configuration / MBUS (BUS = 1)
case.description:
This message is sent to a metering device gateway to configure the meter settings for one channel.
Sender: controller; send type: broadcast or addressed.

datafield.description: Minimum auto reporting interval
Command identifier
The meter bus that should be configured
The meter bus that should be configured

Physical units of first measured quantity
(imported value)

item.description: Current value W, accumulated value kWh
Current value W, accumulated value Wh
Current value m3/h, accumulated value m3
Current value dm3/h, accumulated value dm3

datafield.description:
Physical units of second measured quantity
(exported value)

item.description: Current value W, accumulated value kWh
Current value W, accumulated value Wh
Current value m3/h, accumulated value m3
Current value dm3/h, accumulated value dm3

datafield.description: The primary MBUS address of the meter
Minimum auto reporting interval
Command identifier
The meter bus that should be configured
The meter number of given bus that should be configured

Physical units of first measured quantity
(imported value)

item.description: Current value W, accumulated value kWh
Current value W, accumulated value Wh
Current value m3/h, accumulated value m3
Current value dm3/h, accumulated value dm3

datafield.description:
Physical units of second measured quantity
(exported value)

item.description: Current value W, accumulated value kWh
Current value W, accumulated value Wh
Current value m3/h, accumulated value m3
Current value dm3/h, accumulated value dm3

datafield.description:
The factor for the number of pulses
per value in UNIT1
The number of pulses per value in UNIT1* FACP

item.description: Do not change the current setting of NOP

datafield.description: Preset the accumulated value to this value

item.description: Do not change the current value

datafield.description: Minimum auto reporting interval
Command identifier
The meter bus that should be configured
The meter number of given bus that should be configured

Physical units of first measured quantity
(imported value)

item.description: Current value W, accumulated value kWh
Current value W, accumulated value Wh
Current value m3/h, accumulated value m3
Current value dm3/h, accumulated value dm3

datafield.description:
Physical units of second measured quantity
(exported value)

item.description: Current value W, accumulated value kWh
Current value W, accumulated value Wh
Current value m3/h, accumulated value m3
Current value dm3/h, accumulated value dm3

datafield.description: The D0 protocol that should be used for that meter

case.title: CMD 0x7 - Meter Status Query
case.description:
This message is sent to a metering device gateway to query the status of a meter.
Sender: controller; send type: broadcast or addressed; expected response: CMD 0x8.

datafield.description: Command identifier
The meter bus type that is queried
The meter channel of given bus that status is queried

case.title: CMD 0x8 - Meter reading report / status response
case.description:
This message is sent by a metering device gateway to report the meter values for each configured channel. It is sent if one of the following events occurs:
- Message 'meter status query' has been received (CMD 0x7)
- Status or meter reading of one channel has changed and auto reporting was configured by signal RM.
Sender: sensor; send type: broadcast; maximum send delay 1 s.

datafield.description: Meter channel status
Command identifier
The used bus of the meter status response
The meter number of given bus that status is reported
The selection of the reported value
The unit of the reported value
The reported value
